typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RawFolder as string
}
source(output(
		columns as string[],
		data as string[][],
		date as string,
		close as double,
		high as double,
		low as double,
		open as double,
		volume as string,
		adjClose as double,
		adjHigh as double,
		adjLow as double,
		adjOpen as double,
		adjVolume as string,
		divCash as double,
		splitFactor as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FilePath',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('RAW/Tiingo/',$RawFolder,'/*'))]) ~> RAWTiingo
RAWTiingo derive(Ticker = substring( left(FilePath, (length(FilePath)-5)), 22)) ~> AddStockNameColumn
AddStockNameColumn select(mapColumn(
		date,
		close,
		high,
		low,
		open,
		volume,
		adjClose,
		adjHigh,
		adjLow,
		adjOpen,
		adjVolume,
		divCash,
		splitFactor,
		Ticker
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Ticker
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns
RemoveColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($RawFolder,'_TiingoEodPrices.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WriteToBASE
